检查皮肤癌的风险感知和报道的美国成年人皮肤癌是美国最常见的癌症，也是一个重大的健康问题，每年诊断出数百万的非黑色素瘤病例和成千上万的黑色素瘤。此外，治疗皮肤癌每年花费约89亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/examining-skin-cancer-risk-pocteions-and-reported-sunburns-sunburns-among-us-usts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/examining-skin-cancer-risk-perceptions-and-reported-sunburns-sunburns-among-us-usts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4e18e18e8f-fa15-44b5-44b5-860f-0a4d3f059a9b Wed, 12 Mar 2025 15:53:34 -0400 Examining skin cancer risk perceptions and reported sunburns among U.S. adults

雪冰饮料中的甘油会使儿童生病已经发现用甘油制成的泥冰饮料会使儿童生病。爱尔兰和英国的医生和医学科学家报告了与冰冷茶有关的疾病后进行了调查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/glycerol-in-in-slush-ice-ice-drinks-can-make-children-sick.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/glycerol-in-in-slush-ice-ice-drinks-can-make-children-sick.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de7dd23a-fd25-4576-8BC1-BDA0F82E20CF Wed, 12 Mar 2025 14:40:00 -0400 Glycerol in slush ice drinks can make children sick
早期的ACL手术可能会降低膝关节骨关节炎的风险HSS研究人员的一项临床前研究发现，与延迟手术相比，早期的前交叉韧带（ACL）重建导致免疫细胞活性降低，炎症较少，关节变化较少，而与膝关节骨关节炎相比，与膝关节骨关节炎相比较少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-os-of-knee-osteoarhthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/earlier-acl-surogery-may-redergery-may-reduce--risk-ok-ok-ok-ok-osteoarthrothitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf7cd12-6ff3-6ff3-4f6f-82db-0f97428d5751 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 13:31:57 -0400 Earlier ACL surgery may reduce risk of knee osteoarthritis
